thread.title: Civic Center rally shows support for Affordable Care Act in Denver – The Denver Post
thread.title_full: Civic Center rally shows support for Affordable Care Act in Denver – The Denver Post

author: Danika Worthington
title: Civic Center rally shows support for Affordable Care Act in Denver – The Denver Post
text: Typical February weather to stick around with more snow on the horizon February 25, 2017, 11:02 am The Denver metro area is expected to be partly cloudy Saturday with highs in the upper 30s and lows around 12-16 degrees, National Weather Service spokesman Jim Kalina said. Sunday should be sunny with highs in the 30s as well. Denver police investigating shooting that left one dead in LoDo February 25, 2017, 1:22 pm The Denver Police Department is investigating a shooting that left one man dead in Lodo during the beginning hours of Saturday morning. PHOTOS: Town hall meeting directed at U.S. Sen. Cory Gardner February 25, 2017, 12:04 pm A standing-room-only crowd filled the gymnasium of Byers Middle School Friday night, February 24, 2017 during an “in absentia” town hall meeting directed at U.S. Sen. Cory Gardner, who was invited to attend but did not respond to the invitation. Organizers said the meeting was held as a response to Gardner’s refusal to meet face-to-face with constituents in a similar... Gardner refuses town hall, Colorado resistance organizations host one instead February 24, 2017, 11:07 pm After nearly two months of protest and because Gardner refuses to schedule any public meetings, Coloradans filled up Byers Middle School gym and cafeteria Friday for the “With or Without You” town hall meeting.
